TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WriteableBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource
Public NotInheritable Class WriteableBitmap Inherits BitmapSource

summary.span: 提供一个可写入并可更新的 。

span.span: Provides a that can be written to and updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，按 帧更新和呈现位图。Use the class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis. 这对于生成算法内容（如分形图像）和数据可视化（如音乐可视化工具）很有用。This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer. 类使用两个缓冲区。The class uses two buffers. 在系统内存中分配 *后台缓冲区* ，并累计当前未显示的内容。The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed. *前台缓冲区* 在系统内存中分配，并包含当前显示的内容。The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed. 呈现系统将前台缓冲区复制到视频内存以便显示。The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display. 两个线程使用这些缓冲区。Two threads use these buffers. *用户界面) 线程 (ui* 会生成 ui，但不会将其显示在屏幕上。The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen. UI 线程响应用户输入、计时器和其他事件。The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events. 应用程序可以有多个 UI 线程。An application can have multiple UI threads. *呈现线程* 从 UI 线程中撰写和呈现更改。The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread. 每个应用程序只有一个呈现线程。There is only one render thread per application. UI 线程将内容写入后台缓冲区。The UI thread writes content to the back buffer. 呈现线程从前台缓冲区读取内容，并将其复制到视频内存。The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory. 对后台缓冲区的更改是通过更改的矩形区域进行跟踪的。Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions. 调用 重载之一来自动更新和显示后台缓冲区中的内容。Call one of the overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically. 为了更好地控制更新以及对后台缓冲区的多线程访问，请使用以下工作流。For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow. 1. 调用 方法以保留更新的后台缓冲区。Call the method to reserve the back buffer for updates. 2. 通过访问属性来获取指向后台缓冲区的指针 。Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the property. 3. 将更改写入后台缓冲区。Write changes to the back buffer. 锁定后，其他线程可能会将更改写入后台缓冲区 。Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the is locked. 4. 调用 方法以指示已更改的区域。Call the method to indicate areas that have changed. 5. 调用 方法以释放后台缓冲区，并允许在屏幕上显示。Call the method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen. 在将更新发送到呈现线程时，呈现线程会将已更改的矩形从后台缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer. 呈现系统控制此交换以避免死锁和重绘项目，如 "撕裂"。The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 鼠标移动时使用作为的源 来绘制像素。The following example demonstrates how a can be used as the source of an to draw pixels when the mouse moves. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#WriteableBitmapFullPage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#writeablebitmapfullpage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数时，此构造函数是首选构造函数。The constructor is preferred over using this constructor. 如果不 `source` 使用本机支持的位图格式，则会对每个帧更新应用格式转换，这会降低性能。If `source` does not use a natively supported bitmap format, format conversions are applied for each frame update, which reduces performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的首选值为 `pixelFormat` 和 。The preferred values for `pixelFormat` are and . 这些格式是本机支持的，不需要格式转换。These formats are natively supported and do not require a format conversion. 其他 `pixelFormat` 值需要每个帧更新的格式转换，这会降低性能。Other `pixelFormat` values require a format conversion for each frame update, which reduces performance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddDirtyRect(valuetype System.Windows.Int32Rect dirtyRect) cil managed

span.span: An representing the area that changed.
Dimensions are in pixels.
Specifies the area of the bitmap that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以指示代码对后台缓冲区所做的更改。Call the method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer. 多次调用此方法时，所更改的区域将以足够的、但不一定是最小表示形式累积。When you call this method multiple times, the changed areas are accumulated in a sufficient, but not necessarily minimal, representation. 为提高效率，只保证将标记为 "已更新" 的区域复制到前台缓冲区。For efficiency, only the areas that are marked as dirty are guaranteed to be copied forward to the front buffer. 但是，位图的任何部分都可以向前复制，因此必须确保整个后台缓冲区始终有效。However, any portion of the bitmap may be copied forward, so you must ensure that the entire back buffer is always valid. 仅在对 和方法的调用之间调用方法 ，如类备注中所述 。Call the method only between calls to the and methods, as described in the class remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法指定更改后的缓冲区区域 。The following code example shows how to specify the area of the back buffer that changed by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取指向后台缓冲区的指针。

span.span: Gets a pointer to the back buffer.

value.span: 一个 ，指向后台缓冲区的基址。

span.span: An that points to the base address of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后台缓冲区包含用户请求的像素格式的位图内容。The back buffer contains the bitmap contents in the pixel format requested by the user. 仅在对和方法的调用之间更新后台缓冲区 。Update the back buffer only between calls to the and methods. 如果不遵循类备注中所述的锁定/取消锁定工作流 ，则可能会发生未定义的行为，如撕裂。If you do not follow the Lock/Unlock workflow described in the class remarks, undefined behaviors, such as tearing, can occur. 后台缓冲区的地址不会更改。The address of the back buffer does not change. ## 线程安全性Thread Safety 可以将指针传递 给外部组件和其他线程进行处理，但如果这样做，则必须提供自己的线程协调。You can pass the pointer to external components and other threads for processing, but if you do, you must provide you own thread coordination. 特别是，必须确保 UI 线程通过调用方法来指定更改的区域 ，并且 ui 线程通过调用方法来解锁缓冲区 。In particular, you must ensure that the UI thread specifies changed areas by calling the method, and that the UI thread unlocks the buffer by calling the method.

.method public hidebysig instance void Lock() cil managed

summary.span: 保留后台缓冲区用于更新。

span.span: Reserves the back buffer for updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会递增锁计数。The method increments the lock count. 锁定后 ，呈现系统不会发送更新，直到 通过调用方法完全解锁为止 。When a is locked, the rendering system does not send updates until the is fully unlocked by calls to the method. 您可以使用 方法来支持多线程实现。You can use the method to support multi-threaded implementations. 在这些情况下，UI 线程会锁定位图，并向其他线程公开后台缓冲区。In these scenarios, the UI thread locks the bitmap and exposes the back buffer to other threads. 当工作线程完成帧后，UI 线程将添加已更改的矩形并解锁缓冲区。When the worker thread has finished a frame, the UI thread adds changed rectangles and unlocks the buffer. 当呈现线程获取后台缓冲区的锁时，UI 线程可以阻塞，以将其转发到前台缓冲区。The UI thread can block when the render thread acquires a lock on the back buffer to copy it forward to the front buffer. 如果此块的延迟时间太长，请使用 方法等待一小段时间，然后在锁定后台缓冲区时取消阻止 UI 线程执行其他任务。If the latency from this block is too long, use the method to wait for a short time and then unblock the UI thread to perform other tasks while the back buffer is locked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法保留后台缓冲区 。The following code example shows how to reserve the back buffer by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法递减锁计数。The method decrements the lock count. 当锁计数达到0时，如果已调用方法，则会请求呈现传递 。When the lock count reaches 0, a render pass is requested if the method has been called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法释放后台缓冲区 。The following code example shows how to release the back buffer by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]
